    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Opazovalni sistem, ko je gibalna količina enaka nič</string>
            <string language="en">The Zero-momentum Frame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Null-Momentum Feld</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Vue de Zéro-élan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Quadro Do Zero-Zero-momentum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Pagina Di Zero-quantità di moto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πλαίσιο μηδέν-ορμής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Capítulo Del Cero-i'mpetu</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Spremljaj odvisnost gibalne količine od opazovalnega sistema na primeru trka dveh kroglic.</string>
            <string language="en">Observation of relation between momentum and reference frame in case of collision between two balls.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">trk</string>
            <string language="en">collision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">opazovalni sistem</string>
            <string language="en">reference frame</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gibalna količina</string>
            <string language="en">momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beobachtung der Relation zwischen Momentum und 
Bezugsfeld falls vom Zusammenstoß zwischen zwei Kugeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Observation de relation entre l'élan et la trame
de référence en cas de collision entre deux boules.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Observação da relação entre o momentum e o 
frame da referência caso que de uma colisão entre duas esferas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Osservazione di rapporto fra quantità di moto e 
la struttura di riferimento nel caso dello scontro fra due sfere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρατήρηση της σχέσης μεταξύ της ορμής και του 
πλαισίου αναφοράς σε περίπτωση σύγκρουσης μεταξύ δύο σφαιρών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Observación de la relación entre el ímpetu y 
el marco de la referencia en caso de que de la colisión entre dos 
bolas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenstoß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bezugsfeld</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">collision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trame de référence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">élan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colisão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">frame da referência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scontro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">struttura di riferimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">quantità di moto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύγκρουση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πλαίσιο αναφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ορμή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colisión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">marco de la referencia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ímpetu</string>
          </keyword>
